Body: I have my own self-signed SSL certificate for a website I need to keep relatively secure. I've been able to install my client SSL certificate just fine, but I can't seem to install the server's certificate to the Android trusted list, so I always get a warning when trying to access my site in Chrome from the device.How do I install a PEM or CRT file for a self-signed server certificate?
Title: Adding a self-signed certificate to the trusted list?

history.Text: I have my own self-signed SSL certificate for a website I need to keep relatively secure. I've been able to install my client SSL certificate just fine, but I can't seem to install the server's certificate to the Android trusted list, so I always get a warning when trying to access my site in Chrome from the device.Is there a tutorial somewhere on how to install a PEM or CRT file for a self-signed server certificate?
Adding a self-signed certificate to the trusted list?

history.Comment: edited tags; asking for an external source kinda defeats the purpose here
edited tags; asking for an external source kinda defeats the purpose here
